resources.string: Kaizoyu maintains an internal database that stores your lists, settings, watched episode progress, and more.
Kaizoyu uses a relational database to connect multiple tracking services, enabling the app to access and manage external lists seamlessly.
Check for relational database updates. Current version: %s
Force a relational database update right now, regardless of version. An stable internet connection is required.

Even when you are only streaming a show, Kaizoyu needs to download the entire file to app storage. These files are considered temporary and are managed automatically by the app, requiring no user intervention.
Export a copy of your database. This includes lists (saved shows) and settings.
Import a copy of your database. This will restore your lists and settings to a previous state.
All current lists (saved shows) and settings will be lost forever. They will be replaced with the backup of your choosing.
Failed to read/write to the specified folder

This will invalidate your local relational database, and try to replace it with another. Keep in mind that if you do not have an stable internet connection, you will be left without a relational database until connection is restored and the app is restarted.
No update available, we have latest version
Could not fetch latest version. Are we online?
